publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2994.2 Mr Bruce McFee: Free Swimming Lessons in Aberdeen—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2994) in the name of Richard Baker, insert after "considering" "following the bad example of Labour-controlled Renfrewshire Council by".
S2M-2994.2 Free Swimming Lessons in Aberdeen (lodged on 21 June 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S2M-2994.2 Mr Bruce McFee: Free Swimming Lessons in Aberdeen—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2994) in the name of Richard Baker, insert after “considering” “following the bad example of Labour-controlled Renfrewshire Council by”. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing
